page.title: 02LITTLEMILL FARM
page.content: Littlemill farm is{400 acres and {employs 4 people.}Mr Purdie has 420 cows and 4 bulls.Because of the EEC regulations on milk prodution, he has had to get rid of 16 cows. His milk quota is 400,000 litres.There are between 340 and 400 sheep on the farm.They are black-faced ewes.Around 230 lambs have been born this year. There were 9 pet lambs in a barn this morning.The farm has 5 building.Two of them are modern.The farm has 4 tractors,all of them are Internationals.Mr Purdie said he had been a farmer all his life and enjoyed it.As well as working on his farm he goes to the local cattle market 3 times a month.The unusual thing about Littlemill Farm is that they have no working dogs.
